articles.title: Sacheen Littlefeather: Native American activist and actor who refused Oscar for Brando dies - BBC
articles.description: Native American Sacheen Littlefeather declined Marlon Brando's award for The Godfather in 1973.
articles.content:
Sacheen Littlefeather, the Native American activist who declined Marlon Brando's Oscar for The Godfather on his behalf in 1973, has died aged 75.
The actress, who had breast cancer, died on Sunday, … [+4136 chars]

articles.title: Flu shot this fall: Here's why doctors are urging we all get it - Fox News
articles.description: Health and medical professionals are recommending that those Americans who can take the flu shot be sure to get vaccinated against the flu this fall season. Here's why.
articles.content:
Today's vaccine-weary Americans will be on the receiving end of an important message from their doctors this fall (if they haven't heard it already).

articles.title: Severe preeclampsia treated safely with nifedipine during labor and delivery - American Heart Association
